about:
Im about being nice trying to win games and trying to be the best!however my 2 favourite games on the server is Avicade and Elimination.I am interested in space earth and jokes,riddles,toungue twisters and knock-knock  jokes my favourite video game is Mario and Luigi superstar saga I really like youtube  and mojang also king but I also like toys and stuff.Im gonna tell you a joke and maybe a riddle.Joke:Why did the m and m go to school:to become a smarty.the riddle is whats a alligator in a vest:a investigator







                                                                                                     See ya All on Avicus And Have Fun While You Are There!!!
